com.datasift.client

Class DataSiftClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.client.DataSiftApiClient
      • com.datasift.client.DataSiftClient

  • public class DataSiftClient
extends DataSiftApiClient
    This class is the gateway to the DataSift client APIs. It provides an easy to use, configurable interface for accessing all DataSift features

      • validate

        public FutureData<Validation> validate(String csdl)
        Validate the given CSDL string against the DataSift API
        Parameters:
        csdl - the CSDL to validate
        Returns:
        the results of the validation, use BaseDataSiftResult.isSuccessful() to check if validation was successful or not

      • compile

        public FutureData<Stream> compile(String csdl)
        Compile a CSDL string to a stream hash to which you can later subscribe and receive interactions from
        Parameters:
        csdl - the CSDL to compile
        Returns:
        a stream object representing the DataSift compiled CSDL, use .Stream#hash() to list the hash for the compiled CSDL

      • balance

        public FutureData<Balance> balance()
        Returns:
        The balance on the account being used to make API calls

      • dpu

        public FutureData<Dpu> dpu(Stream stream)
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream for which the DPU information is to be fetched
        Returns:
        a DPU breakdown of the stream's usage

        Returns:
